text:
="preserve">Emil Milton Cadkin (Russian: Эмиль Кадкин; August 26, 1920 – December 16, 2020) was an American composer. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He was known for composing the movie scores of "The Big Fix" (1947) and "The Killer Shrews" (1959).
Cadkin died on December 16, 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 100.
